description:
<p>Inclusion at HMP Bullingdon are currently recruiting Recovery Workers to provide a range of low , medium and high intensity interventions as part of the integrated offender substance misuse and mental health team to those service users experiencing substance misuse problems.</p>
<p>The successful applicant will work within a multi -disciplinary team within a custodial environment delivering a high standard of psychosocial interventions, (incorporating assessment, recovery planning, casework coordination and psycho-social interventions) in response to the needs of the service users to achieve recovery and positive outcomes within a recovery orientated substance misuse service and mental health service as part of Inclusion and Midlands Partnership NHS Foundation trust.</p>
title: Recovery Worker
